## Including Plots

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r grafico_platform, echo=FALSE}
# mostrar top 10 platforms
exploits_top_platforms <- exploits %>% group_by(platform) %>% summarise(total = n())
exploits_top_platforms <- arrange(exploits_top_platforms, desc(total))
ggplot(exploits_top_platforms)  + geom_count()
exploits_top_platforms <- exploits_top_platforms[1:10,] 
qplot(x=exploits_top_platforms)
```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
